name: Vajrasana (Thunderbolt Pose)
target_benefit: Improves digestion, prevents acidity, and strengthens pelvic muscles.

name: Sheetali Pranayama (Cooling Breath)
target_benefit: Cools the body, reduces acidity, and calms the nervous system.

name: Malasana (Garland Pose)
target_benefit: Stimulates metabolism, relieves constipation, and opens the hips.

name: Pawanmuktasana (Wind-Relieving Pose)
target_benefit: Releases abdominal gas, improves digestion, and relieves lower back pain.

name: Shavasana (Corpse Pose)
target_benefit: Deeply relaxes the body, reduces stress, and lowers blood pressure.

name: Ardha Matsyendrasana (Half Lord of the Fishes Pose)
target_benefit: Massages abdominal organs, detoxifies the liver, and improves spinal mobility.

name: Surya Namaskar (Sun Salutation)
target_benefit: Full body cardiovascular workout, improves flexibility, and boosts immunity.

name: Paschimottanasana (Seated Forward Bend)
target_benefit: Calms the mind, stimulates the liver and kidneys, and relieves stress.

name: Kapalabhati Pranayama (Skull Shining Breath)
target_benefit: Clears the respiratory tract, boosts metabolism, and improves brain function.

name: Baddha Konasana (Butterfly Pose)
target_benefit: Stimulates reproductive organs, relieves menstrual discomfort, and opens hips.

name: Viparita Karani (Legs-Up-The-Wall Pose)
target_benefit: Improves blood circulation, reduces edema, and relieves tired legs.

name: Balasana (Child's Pose)
target_benefit: Releases tension in the back and shoulders, and relieves fatigue and anxiety.

name: Nadi Shodhana Pranayama (Alternate Nostril Breathing)
target_benefit: Balances the left and right hemispheres of the brain, reduces anxiety.

name: Dhanurasana (Bow Pose)
target_benefit: Expands the chest, stimulates abdominal organs, and improves posture.

name: Bhujangasana (Cobra Pose)
target_benefit: Strengthens the spine, opens the heart and lungs, and relieves asthma.

name: Matsyasana (Fish Pose)
target_benefit: Stretches the neck and chest, highly beneficial for respiratory issues.

name: Ujjayi Pranayama (Ocean Breath)
target_benefit: Soothes the nervous system, warms the body, and regulates blood pressure.

name: Jal Neti (Nasal Cleansing Kriya)
target_benefit: Clears nasal passages, relieves sinusitis, and improves breathing.

name: Gomukhasana (Cow Face Pose)
target_benefit: Stretches shoulders and arms, relieves frozen shoulder and neck tension.

name: Anulom Vilom Pranayama
target_benefit: Clears blockages in energy channels, supports respiratory and mental health.

name: Adho Mukha Svanasana (Downward-Facing Dog)
target_benefit: Energizes the body, stretches hamstrings, and relieves headache.

name: Bhastrika Pranayama (Bellows Breath)
target_benefit: Generates internal heat, clears the lungs, and boosts immunity.

name: Simhasana (Lion Pose)
target_benefit: Relieves tension in the face and chest, excellent for sore throat and speech defects.

name: Setu Bandhasana (Bridge Pose)
target_benefit: Strengthens the back, glutes, and hamstrings; opens the chest.

name: Vrikshasana (Tree Pose)
target_benefit: Improves balance, focus, and concentration; strengthens the legs.

name: Yoga Nidra (Yogic Sleep)
target_benefit: Deep guided relaxation that reduces insomnia, stress, and anxiety.

name: Trataka (Candle Gazing)
target_benefit: Improves vision, relieves eye strain, and enhances memory.

name: Ustrasana (Camel Pose)
target_benefit: Stretches the entire front of the body, improves posture, and relieves fatigue.

name: Tadasana (Mountain Pose)
target_benefit: Improves posture, strengthens thighs, and relieves sciatica.

name: Trikonasana (Triangle Pose)
target_benefit: Stretches legs and torso, mobilizes hips, and relieves backache.

name: Marjaryasana-Bitilasana (Cat-Cow Pose)
target_benefit: Improves spinal flexibility and relieves tension in the neck and back.

name: Sarvangasana (Shoulder Stand)
target_benefit: Stimulates the thyroid gland, improves circulation, and prevents hair fall.

name: Bhramari Pranayama (Bee Breath)
target_benefit: Instantly calms the mind, relieves tension headaches, and reduces anger.

name: Navasana (Boat Pose)
target_benefit: Strengthens the core, improves digestion, and supports weight management.

name: Halasana (Plow Pose)
target_benefit: Calms the brain, stimulates the thyroid, and stretches the spine and shoulders.

name: Agnisar Kriya
target_benefit: Stimulates the digestive fire, tones abdominal organs, and improves sluggish metabolism.

name: Griva Sanchalana (Neck Rolls)
target_benefit: Releases accumulated tension in the cervical spine and shoulders.

name: Palming
target_benefit: Soothes the optic nerve, relaxes facial muscles, and relieves eye strain.
